com.digi.xbee.api.listeners

Interface IModemStatusReceiveListener


  • public interface IModemStatusReceiveListener
    This interface defines the required methods that an object should implement to behave as a modem status listener and be notified when modem status events are received from the radio.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void modemStatusEventReceived(ModemStatusEvent modemStatusEvent)
      Called when a modem status event from the radio is received.

    • Method Detail

      • modemStatusEventReceived

        void modemStatusEventReceived(ModemStatusEvent modemStatusEvent)
        Called when a modem status event from the radio is received.
        Parameters:
        modemStatusEvent - The modem status event that was received.
        See Also:
        ModemStatusEvent
